item.title: Solving ‘Spatial types and functions are not available’ with Entity Framework
item.description: Using SQL Server’s Geospatial features with Entity Framework is awesome. I was crusing along just fine with using DbGeography for an ASP.Net application I’m working on… Right up until I deployed to the server. Yep. It worked on my machine, but alas, I was hitting a runtime exception on my test server. This was the exception: Spatial types and functions are not available for this provider because the assembly ‘Microsoft.
